description: Schema for amp-specific page ping events

scrollHeight.description: Height of page in pixels, as provided by AMP

scrollLeft.description: Pixels scrolled from the left, as provided by AMP

scrollWidth.description: Width of page in pixels, as provided by AMP

totalEngagedTime.description: Seconds of engaged time spent on page, according to the AMP platform's measurement of engaged time

viewportHeight.description: Height of viewport in pixels, taking into account zoom and window size, as provided by AMP

viewportWidth.description: Width of viewport in pixels, taking into account zoom and window size, as provided by AMP
